meanings: Assistant adverb do something while doing something

vlive.korean: 내가 그동안 피 땀 흘려가며 이만큼 성장시켰는데! I made this big with my own blood and sweat!! 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] IU 10th Anniv. Tour Concert 'dlwlrma. (이 지금)' - Singapore
vlive.english: I made this big with my own blood and sweat!!

vlive.korean: [색도 바꿔가며] - 빨리, 빨리, 빨리, 빨리 - 아니 세이야! [She's changing colors] - Hurry up! - No, don't! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [Weki Meki] 윜밐스쿨 하고 싶은 거 다 해 (윜.하.다) (Weki Meki’s comeback showcase)
vlive.english: [She's changing colors] - Hurry up! - No, don't!

vlive.korean: 부드럽게 살살 돌려가며 발라주세요. Use gentle, rolling motions to put it on. 듣기 View video Wishtrend TV : All About Dark Circles | 5 Causes and Hacks to Remove Dark Circles | Wishtrend TV
vlive.english: Use gentle, rolling motions to put it on.

vlive.korean: 오케이! - 졸음을 참아가며... - 오케이! Okay. - I fought against tiredness. - Okay! 듣기 View video BTS : BTS Live : 오랜만이죠?! 😗
vlive.english: Okay. - I fought against tiredness. - Okay!

vlive.korean: [금가루 묻혀가며 먹는 이 맛] 어때요? [Having gold flakes on the lip] How do you like it? 듣기 View video 방판소년단-SBS Plus : [방판소년단 EP78] 난생 처음 베이징덕 접해본 아이돌
vlive.english: [Having gold flakes on the lip] How do you like it?

examples.korean: She had to coax the car along. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 차를 살살 달래 가며 몰아야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had to coax the car along. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Stir in the milk until the sauce thickens. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 소스가 걸쭉해질 때까지 우유를 저어 가며 넣어라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Stir in the milk until the sauce thickens. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a round robin story 듣기 Add to Wordbook 여러 사람이 돌려 가며 쓴[하는] 이야기 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a round robin story Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Rescuers worked in relays to save the trapped miners. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 갇힌 광부들을 구출하기 위해 구조원들이 교대를 해 가며 작업을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Rescuers worked in relays to save the trapped miners. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She was barely able to stammer out a description of her attacker. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 간신히 더듬어 가며 자신을 공격한 자의 인상착의를 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was barely able to stammer out a description of her attacker. Add to Wordbook
